title: Bounty _BOX
author: Bounty _BOX
created_time: July 17, 2023, 06:56:52 AMLast edit: August 15, 2023, 04:01:49 AM by Bounty _BOX
content: _________________________________________________________ Website          Twitter          Telegram          Facebook          Telegram       LinkedIn _________________________________________________________All participants share ius wallet  https://iuswallet.org/1. Bounty campaign will be managed by  bounty_box2. All participants must join the IUS Token 's official   Telegram group .3. All participants must join bounty_Box  Telegram group .4. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty_box Group.5. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.6. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.7. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address: Twitter _30%Telegram _25%Facebook _ 25%YouTube _ 20%WEEK LIST1 WEEK _ 17-07 _ 23-072 WEEK _ 24-07 _ 30-073 WEEK _ 31-07 _ 06-084 WEEK _ 09-08 _ 14-08Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow IUS Token  Twitter page .2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use : #IUS #Presale #Sustainability #bsc Join Here Rewards:1. Have more than 500 Friends: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 Friends: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 Friends: 3 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must like IUS Token  Facebook page .2. Participants must  have 500+ Friends3. Participants have to make 2 new posts and 3 shares per week (maximum 2 post/share per day).4. Time gap between 2 post/share needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use: #IUS #Presale #Sustainability #bsc Join Here  Spreadsheet Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants have to use IUS name on telegram account that shouldn’t promote other projects.2. Profile picture shouldn’t promote any other project.3. Write at least 2 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/IustitiaCoinIUSCoin and 3 messages weekly in other crypto related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear IUS Token avatar and text until the end of the campaign. Join Here Rewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Videos must have at least 200+ youtube views. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, coinbit,latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified! Join Here  Mastersheet
